Illeana.name: Illeana
Illeana.desc:
<c=45e260>ILLEANA</c>
Your corrosion engineer. Her cards are a mix of <c=keyword>heals</c> and <c=keyword>evasion</c>, but with the added risk of <c=downside>corrosion</c>.

Craig.name: Craig
Craig.desc:
<c=41b5ae>CRAIG</c>
Your docking expert. Her cards manipulate the <c=keyword>midrow</c> and <c=keyword>ship positioning</c> with her handy <c=keyword>Robo-hand</c>.

lisard.name: //lisard.exe
lisard.desc:
<c=45e2b0>lisard.exe</c>
Craig's prototype computer persona. May suggest crazy things.

Tarnish.name: Tarnish
Tarnish.desc: Take double damage when hit. When applying <c=status>TARNISH</c>, Convert any <c=status>CORRODE</c> into <c=status>TARNISH</c>. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 at start of turn.</c>

SnekTunezStat.desc: Gives either <c=energy>ENERGY NEXT TURN</c>, <c=damage>OVERDRIVE</c>, <c=healing>DRAW NEXT TURN</c>, or <c=status>EVADE</c>. Loops these four statuses in order, on repeat.

ExtraCondition.MaxShield: If <c=keyword>base max shield</c> is lower than <c=keyword>{{requirement}}</c>, all actions on this card are <c=downside>disabled</c>!
ExtraCondition.MaxTotalShield: If <c=keyword>total max shield</c> is lower than <c=keyword>{{requirement}}</c>, all actions on this card are <c=downside>disabled</c>!

bigCorrode.name: SUPER ACID MISSILE
bigCorrode.desc: This missile is going to inflict <c=damage>2</c> <c=corrode>CORRODE</c>.

ForgedCertificate.name: FORGED CERTIFICATE
ForgedCertificate.desc: Every 3rd time you take hull damage, immediately <c=hull>heal 1</c>.

ByproductProcessor.name: BYPRODUCT PROCESSOR
ByproductProcessor.desc: Negate 1 <c=corrode>corrode damage</c> as <c=action>blockable hurt</c>. If you take hull damage from <c=status>CORRODE</c>, gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c>.
ByproductProcessor.descOld:
If you end your turn with more than 0 <c=status>CORRODE</c>, reduce <c=status>CORRODE</c> by 1 and gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c>.
<c=downside><c=status>CORRODE</c> will still trigger before removal.</c>

TarnishedSyringe.name: TARNISHED SYRINGE
TarnishedSyringe.desc: Apply 1 <c=status>TARNISH</c> to both parties whenever an <c=drone>acid missile</c> is destroyed.

CausticArmor.name: CAUSTIC ARMOR
CausticArmor.desc: At the start of every turn, gain <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> equal to your <c=status>TARNISH</c> and/or double your <c=status>CORRODE</c>.

ExperimentalLubricant.name: EXPERIMENTAL LUBRICANT
ExperimentalLubricant.desc: Once per turn, when you gain <c=status>CORRODE</c>, gain 1 <c=status>HERMES BOOTS</c>.

ExternalFuelSource.name: EXTERNAL FUEL SOURCE
ExternalFuelSource.desc:
Gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c> whenever you gain a <c=cardtrait>temporary</c> card.
<c=downside>Caps at 2 <c=status>EVADE</c> per turn.</c>

SportsStereo.name: SPORTS SLITHERMAN
SportsStereo.desc:
Replaces <c=artifact>STOLEN SLITERMAN</c>.
On combat start, add a <c=cardtrait>temporary</c> <c=card>SnekTunez A</c> to your deck.

DigitalizedStereo.name: DIGITALIZED SLITHERMAN
DigitalizedStereo.desc:
Replaces <c=artifact>STOLEN SLITERMAN</c>.
On combat start, add an <c=cardtrait>expensive</c> <c=card>SnekTunez B</c> to your hand.

ReusableScrap.name: REUSABLE SCRAP
ReusableScrap.desc: Whenever you gain any <c=status>SHIELD</c>, gain <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> equal to your <c=status>TARNISH</c>.

ResourceOverflowCatcher.name: HEAL OVERFLOW GUTTER
ResourceOverflowCatcher.desc: Healing beyond max hull will instead give <c=status>SHIELD</c> equal to the <c=keyword>overflow amount</c>.

ThrustThursters.name: THRUST THURSTERS
ThrustThursters.desc: Once per turn, when you gain <c=status>EVADE</c>, gain 1 more.

AirlockSnek.name: AIRLOCKED SNEK
AirlockSnek.desc:
Start combat with 3 <c=status>OVERDRIVE</c> and 2 <c=status>MISSING ILLEANA</c>.
<c=trash>"Peri is sick and tired of Illeana's schenanigans."</c>

JitterStick.name: JITTER STICK CONTROLS
JitterStick.desc: <c=action>Movement</c> actions each give 1 <c=status>EVADE</c> and <c=status>LOSE ALL EVADE NEXT TURN</c>.

LooseStick.name: LOOSE JITTER STICK
LooseStick.desc: At the start of every turn, gain 1 <c=status>ENGINE STALL</c>. For <c=action>any move</c> done while <c=keyword>movement restricted</c>, gain the amount as <c=status>EVADE</c> (up to 3 per turn).
LooseStick.descAlt: At the start of every turn, gain 1 <c=status>ENGINE STALL</c>. For <c=action>any move</c> that <c=keyword>fails completely</c> (includes running into walls), gain the amount as <c=status>EVADE</c> (up to 3 per turn).

MadeFromAcid.name: MADE WITH ACID
MadeFromAcid.desc: At the start of every turn, add a <c=card>Chipshot</c> to your hand for every stack of <c=status>CORRODE</c> you have.

FuelEqualizer.name: FUEL EQUALIZER
FuelEqualizer.desc:
At the start of every turn, balance <c=status>EVADE</c> and <c=status>DRONESHIFT</c> such that their amount is equal to each other.
If the total is an <c=keyword>odd number</c>, gain 1 more to achieve the balance.

LubricatedHeatpump.name: LUBRICATED HEATPUMP
LubricatedHeatpump.desc: Increases your ship's <c=downside>overheat</c> threshold by 1. Instead of <c=downside>overheating</c>, gain 1 <c=status>CORRODE</c>.

AutododgeExpress.name: AUTODODGE EXPRESS
AutododgeExpress.desc: Whenever you gain any <c=status>AUTODODGE</c>, activate it immediately.

ExtraSlip.name: EXTRA-SLIP
ExtraSlip.descOld: While you're <c=corrode>corroded</c>, playing your <c=keyword>left/rightmost card in hand</c> moves you left/right 1.
ExtraSlip.desc:
While you're <c=corrode>corroded</c>, playing your <c=keyword>left/rightmost card in hand</c> moves you left/right 1.
While you're <c=keys>tarnished</c>, your first <c=keyword>leftmost card each combat</c> gives 1 <c=status>AUTODODGE LEFT</c>, and your first <c=keyword>rightmost card each turn<c/> gives 1 <c=status>AUTODODGE RIGHT</c>.

UnprotectedStorage.name: UNPROTECTED SHARD STORAGE
UnprotectedStorage.desc:
You can gain <c=status>SHARD</c> beyond the capacity (up to 5 <c=status>SHARD</c> gain at a time).
<c=downside>Take blockable damage equal to excess <c=status>SHARD</c> at end of turn</c>.

HullHarvester.name: HULL HARVESTER
HullHarvester.desc: The 5th time you hit the enemy ship each turn, <c=hull>heal</c> 1.

Competition.name: COMPETITION
Competition.desc:
Once per turn, When you play an <c=e6e164>EDDIE</c> card, the next <c=45e260>ILLEANA</c> card plays <c=keyword>twice</c>.
When you play an <c=45e260>ILLEANA</c> card, the next <c=e6e164>EDDIE</c> card fully refunds <c=energy>ENERGY</c>.
<c=downside>Whoever's card you play first goes <c=status>MISSING</c> for 2.</c>

BountifulBloodBank.name: BOUNTIFUL BLOOD BANK
BountifulBloodBank.desc:
At the start of combat, add a <c=card>Credit Card</c> to your hand.
<c=keyword>Use the card to deposit your max hull.</c>
For every [<c=keyword>4</c>/<c=keyword>2</c>/<c=keyword>1</c>] you deposit (based on encounter type), add an additional <c=keyword>1</c> to the withdrawal amount.
At the end of combat, withdraw all as <c=healing>max hull</c>.

ChanceOfAcid.name: CHANCE OF ACID
ChanceOfAcid.descOld: You have a 50% chance of taking hull damage from <c=corrode>corrode</c>.

ReactiveFormula.name: REACTIVE FORMULA
ReactiveFormula.desc:
When a ship gains <c=status>HEAT</c>, gain bonus <c=status>HEAT</c> equal to <c=status>CORRODE</c>.
When a ship gains <c=status>CURSE</c>, gain bonus <c=status>CURSE</c> equal to <c=status>TARNISH</c>.

DemolitionSetup.name: DEMOLITION SETUP PRO(TM)
DemolitionSetup.desc:
Launching and sticking a <c=parttrait>charge</c> gives 1 <c=status>EVADE</c> (up to <c=keyword>3</c> times per turn).
<c=downside>Lose all <c=status>EVADE</c> on <c=parttrait>charge</c> detonation.</c>

RegenerativeBacktrack.name: REGENERATIVE BACKTRACK
RegenerativeBacktrack.desc: Refund at most half of unused <c=status>BACKTRACK</c> at the end of turn as <c=status>EVADE</c>.

WallSnek.name: DODGING RESPONSIBILITIES
WallSnek.desc: Ignore 1 <c=corrode>corrode</c> damage per 1 <c=status>FADE</c>. Lose <c=status>FADE</c> equal to <c=status>CORRODE</c>.

Oxyboom.name: OXYBOOM
Oxyboom.desc: All <c=midrow>missiles</c> deal 1 less damage and apply 1 <c=status>OXIDATION</c>

SlippyShuffle.name: SLIP N SHUFFLE
SlippyShuffle.desc:
Gain 1 <c=status>OXIDATION</c> whenever you draw cards.
Whenever cards move from the discard pile to the draw pile, move the <c=status>OXIDATION</c> to enemy ship.

SwaySwheel.name: SWAY SWHEEL
SwaySwheel.desc: The first <c=action>move</c> action each turn gives equal amount of <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>.

ResidualHeatWelder.name: RESIDUAL HEAT WELDER
ResidualHeatWelder.desc:
After <c=action>OVERHEATING</c>, the next <c=heal>heal</c> will give <c=keyword>bonus</c> <c=heal>healing</c> equal to <c=keyword>excess heat</c> before the overheat (amount beyond the limit).
<c=downside>Only usable during combat.</c>
ResidualHeatWelder.descAlt: After <c=action>overheating</c>, healing during the next 5 turns will heal 1 more. <c=action>Overheating</c> during the 5 turns <c=downside>does not reset the turn limit</c> but increases the <c=heal>bonus healing</c> amount.

TakeABreak.name: TAKE-A-BREAK(TM)
TakeABreak.desc:
Once per combat, playing <c=card>Off Balance</c> <c=heal>heals</c> for the number of cards played that turn.
Cards played <c=keyword>after</c> <c=card>Off Balance</c> do not count.
TakeABreak.descAlt:
Once per combat, playing <c=card>Off Balance</c> <c=heal>heals</c> for the number of <c=87B2CF>Jost</c> cards played that turn.
Cards played <c=keyword>after</c> <c=card>Off Balance</c> do not count.

SpecialSalt.name: ELECTRIFYING SALT
SpecialSalt.desc: Hitting a <c=keys>tarnished</c> ship with <c=action>Chain Lightning</c> increases the <c=status>TARNISH</c> by 1.
SpecialSalt.descAlt: Hitting a <c=keys>tarnished</c> ship with <c=action>Chain Lightning</c> increases the <c=status>TARNISH</c> by the chain amount.

ConstantInnovation.name: CONSTANT INNOVATION
ConstantInnovation.desc:
Once per turn:
When you <c=hull>heal</c>, gain 1 <c=energy>energy</c>.
When you gain <c=status>evade</c>, draw a card.
When you <c=keyword>attack</c>, randomly <c=status>move 1</c>.
ConstantInnovation.descOld:
Immediately choose 1 of 2 artifacts per boss defeated.
After every event, choose 1 of 2 common artifacts

Limbless.name: LIMBLESS
Limbless.desc: Your <c=part>wings</c> count as <c=part>empty</c>. <c=downside>Your <c=part>empty</c> parts take 1 damage when a shot passes through</c>
Limbless.altDesc: Your <c=part>wings</c> become <c=part>empty</c>. <c=downside>Your <c=part>empty</c> parts take 1 damage when a shot passes through</c>

PersonalStereo.name: STOLEN SLITHERMAN
PersonalStereo.iGotDesc: Every start of combat, add a <c=card>SnekTunez</c> to your hand. SnekTunez is a registered trademark of REDACTED corp and is not responsible for any liabilities if any traks are listened outside working environments.
PersonalStereo.desc: On combat start, add a <c=card>SnekTunez</c> to your hand.
PersonalStereo.descChill: Every start of combat, add a <c=card>SnekTunez</c> to your hand. The next encounter will play <c=card>Chill</c>!
PersonalStereo.descHype: Every start of combat, add a <c=card>SnekTunez</c> to your hand. The next encounter will play <c=card>Hype</c>!
PersonalStereo.descSad: Every start of combat, add a <c=card>SnekTunez</c> to your hand. The next encounter will play <c=card>Sad</c>!
PersonalStereo.descGroovy: Every start of combat, add a <c=card>SnekTunez</c> to your hand. The next encounter will play <c=card>Groovy</c>!

Tempoboosters.name: TEMPOBOOSTERS
Tempoboosters.desc:
At the start of <c=keyword>elite/boss</c> combat, gain <c=keyword>1</c> <c=status>ACE</c> and <c=downside>1</c> <c=status>CORRODE</c>.
If you have <c=artifact>LIGHTENED LOAD</c>, instead of <c=status>CORRODE</c> gain <c=downside>3</c> <c=status>TARNISH</c>.

WarpPrototype.name: WARP PROTOTYPE
WarpPrototype.desc:
Replaces <c=artifact>WARP PREP</c>.
Gain 1 <c=status>PERFECT SHIELD</c> and 4 <c=status>EVADE</c> on the first turn.

ExternalFuelSource.name: EXTERNAL FUEL SOURCE
ExternalFuelSource.desc:
Spend 1 charge to gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c> whenever you gain a <c=cardtrait>temporary</c> card.
At the start of every turn, gain 1 charge, up to 4.

LightenedLoad.name: LIGHTENED LOAD
LightenedLoad.desc: Whenever you apply <c=status>TARNISH</c> to yourself, gain 1 <c=status>AUTODODGE RIGHT</c>.

ToxicSports.name: TOXIC SPORTS
ToxicSports.desc:
Whenever you apply <c=status>CORRODE</c> to yourself, attack for the same amount of total corrode you have.
<c=keyword>Sasha's Sporting Event Only.</c>

PseudoPacifist.name: PSEUDOPACIFIST
PseudoPacifist.desc: <c=downside>Disable all your cannons.</c> When a disabled part is hit, reflect shot <c=keyword>double</c> the hull damage taken.

CobraVoodoo.name: MAGIC VOODOO SNAKE CUBE
CobraVoodoo.desc:
At the start of turn, deal direct damage equal to the amount of hull damage taken last turn.
<c=downside>Disabled for the rest of combat if you attack an enemy part.</c>

GooseH8r.name: Goose Hater
GooseH8r.desc: Every time you play an <c=illeana>Illeana</c> card, the enemy takes 1 damage. <c=downside>Temporary.</c>

BuildACure.name: Build-A-Cure
BuildACure.descB: Add 2 <c=card>Cure B</c> and a <c=card>Failure B</c> to your draw pile.
BuildACure.descA: Add a <c=card>Cure A</c> and a <c=card>Failure</c> to your draw pile.
BuildACure.desc: Add a <c=card>Cure</c> and a <c=card>Failure</c> to your draw pile.

FindACure.name: Find-A-Solution
FindACure.descB: Add a <c=card>Solution B</c> and 2 <c=card>Accident</c> to your draw pile.
FindACure.descA: Add 2 <c=card>Solution</c> and an <c=card>Accident A</c> to your draw pile.
FindACure.desc: Add a <c=card>Solution</c> and an <c=card>Accident</c> to your draw pile.

Amputation.name: Amputation
Amputation.desc:
X = your missing hull.
<c=healing>Heal X</c>.
<c=status>-X Corrode</c>.
<c=downside>-2 Max Hull</c>.
Amputation.descA:
X = your missing hull.
<c=healing>Heal X</c>.
<c=status>-X Corrode</c>.
<c=downside>-1 Max Hull</c>.
Amputation.descB:
X = your missing hull.
<c=healing>Heal X</c>.
<c=status>X/2 Ace</c>({0}).
<c=status>-X Corrode</c>.
<c=downside>-3 Max Hull</c>.

BakedHull.name: Baked Hull
BakedHull.descB:
<c=keyword>If base max shield >1:</c>
X = Max Shield
<c=heal>2X Max Hull</c>({{amount}})
<c=downside>-2 Max Shield</c>
BakedHull.descB2:
<c=keyword>If base max shield >1:</c>
<c=faint>X = Max Shield
2X Max Hull
-2 Max Shield</c>
BakedHull.descX:
If you have >0 max shield:
<c=healing>1</c> max hull
<c=downside>-1</c> <c=status>SHIELD CAP</c>
<c=status>SHIELD</c> = 0
<c=downside>1</c> <c=status>CORRODE</c>
BakedHull.descY:
If you have >0 max shield
<c=healing>+3</c> max hull
<c=downside>-1</c> max shield
BakedHull.descD:
On <c=keyword>3rd</c> use, <c=heal>heal 1</c> and gain <c=hull>1 max hull</c>.<c=downside>
Further use <c=energy>refunds</c> and <c=action>draws</c> 1.</c><c={{color}}>[{{uses}}/{{limit}}]</c>
BakedHull.desc: On <c=keyword>3rd</c> use, <c=heal>heal 1</c> and gain <c=hull>1 max hull</c>. <c=downside>Further use <c=heal>heals only</c>.</c> <c={{color}}>[{{uses}}/{{limit}}]</c>
BakedHull.descA:
On <c=keyword>5th</c> use and onward, gain <c=hull>1 max hull</c>.
<c={{color}}>[{{uses}}/{{limit}}]</c>
BakedHull.descBA:
On <c=keyword>10th</c> use, <c=hull>double your max hull</c> and <c=downside>destroy this card</c>.
<c={{color}}>[{{uses}}/{{limit}}]</c>

ImprovisedHull.name: Improvised Hull
ImprovisedHull.desc:
<c=downside>Lose all but 1 hull.</c>
Convert lost hull to <c=healing>max hull</c>.
ImprovisedHull.descA:
<c=downside>Lose all but 1 hull.</c>
Convert lost hull to <c=status>PERFECT SHIELD</c>(max 3) and <c=healing>max hull</c>.
ImprovisedHull.descB:
On draw, if possible, <c=downside>lose 3 hull</c> and store 2.
On play, convert stored hull({0}) to <c=healing>max hull</c>.

ImprovisedTiming.name: Improvised Timing
ImprovisedTiming.desc:
-1 Cost on draw.
X = Cost
<c=healing>X Max Hull</c>.
<c=downside>X <c=status>Corrode</c>.</c>
ImprovisedTiming.descA:
-1 Cost on draw.
X = Cost
<c=healing>X Max Hull</c>.
<c=downside>+1 <c=status>Corrode</c>.</c>
ImprovisedTiming.descB:
+1 Cost on draw.
X = Cost
<c=healing>X Max Hull</c>.
<c=downside>X <c=status>Tarnish</c>.</c>

TheFailure.name: Failure
TheFailure.descB:
<c=downside>+1 <c=status>corrode</c> to self and foe on draw.</c>
-1 <c=status>corrode</c> to self when played.
TheFailure.desc:
<c=downside>+1 <c=status>corrode</c> to self on draw.</c>
-1 <c=status>corrode</c> when played.

TheAccident.name: Accident
TheAccident.descB:
<c=downside>+1 <c=status>tarnish</c> to self, and foe on draw.</c>
1 <c=status>tarnish</c> to foe when played.
TheAccident.desc:
<c=downside>+1 <c=status>tarnish</c> to self on draw.</c>
1 <c=status>tarnish</c> to foe when played.

Coalescent.name: Coalescent
Coalescent.desc:
X = your max hull.
<c=status>X foe tarnish</c>.
<c=downside>X self tarnish</c>.
Coalescent.descB:
X = enemy max hull.
<c=status>X foe tarnish</c>.
<c=downside>X self tarnish</c>.

PerfectShield.name: Perfect Shield
PerfectShield.desc:
X = your missing shield.
<c=status>X Shield.
X Temp Shield.</c>

BloodCard.descFlip: For every <c=keyword>{1}</c> you deposit, add <c=keyword>{2}</c> to withdrawal amount.
BloodCard.tooltip: <c=keyword>You can't die from playing this card.</c>
BloodCard.descA:
Deposit ({0}) hull and max hull with 50% interest.
+1 when you flip the card (Max: All but 1 max hull).
BloodCard.descB:
Deposit ({0}) hull and max hull with 100% interest.
+1 when you flip the card (Max: All but 1 max hull).

AntiSnakeMode.name: Ophidiophobia Mode
AntiSnakeMode.desc: Hides snake and snake-related content... by finding a suitable replacement.

AllowAllArtifacts.name: Enable Unreleased Illeana Artifacts
AllowAllArtifacts.desc: Allows unreleased Illeana artifacts to appear in the artifact draw pool.

other.SnekPigment:
<c=45e260>ILLEANA PIGMENT</c>
Your next colourless card also grants you <c=value>1</c> <c=status>AUTODODGE RIGHT</c>.
